summary: Integration test suite that validates the LED (Longformer Encoder‑Decoder) model's inference and sequence‑to‑sequence generation using the original checkpoints, including handling of the position‑embeddings adjustment and both head‑enabled and head‑less configurations with a default tokenizer.
business_intent: Ensure reliable deployment of the LED model by confirming its correctness and compatibility with original checkpoint files, thereby reducing risk in production NLP applications.
